[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [210000] Estado de situación financiera, corriente / no corriente but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentLiabilities, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentPayables, ifrs-full:ShorttermEmployeeBenefitsAccruals, ifrs-full:CurrentPayablesOnSocialSecurityAndTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax, ifrs-full:CurrentDerivativeFinancialLiabilities All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520000] Estado de flujos de efectivo, método indirecto includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations of 356,204,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 537,201,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -3. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations that should add to 356,204,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInOtherOperatingReceivables 9,806,000 + AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAccountReceivable -21,994,000 + AdjustmentsForImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossInventories -131,000 + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingPayables 21,008,000 + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInTradeAccountPayable -22,213,000 + AdjustmentsForProvisions -10,039,000 + ProfitLoss 180,997,000 + FlujosDeEfectivoProcedentesDeUtilizadosEnActividadesAntesDeCambiosEnElCapitalCirculanteEFE 379,767,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [520000] Estado de flujos de efectivo, método indirecto. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations Total Value : 356,204,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/95980020140005021479/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/95980020140005021479-2020-12-31.zip/95980020140005021479-2020-12-31/reports/95980020140005021479-2020-12-31.html 209

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 94,038,000 reported in the network role https://www.mediaset.es/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-210000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of 94,038,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role https://www.mediaset.es/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of TreasuryShares : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/95980020140005021479/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/95980020140005021479-2020-12-31.zip/95980020140005021479-2020-12-31/reports/95980020140005021479-2020-12-31.html 209
